item.title: 欧尔班推动增长让匈牙利投资者担心局势动荡
item.description: 匈牙利政府正在采取人们所熟悉的干预经济的策略，这让投资者感到紧张，担心该国的资产在 2026 年大选前将继续表现不佳。【原文：Hungary’s government is resorting to familiar tactics of interventions in the economy, leaving investors nervous that the country’s assets will keep underperforming in the run-up to elections in 2026.】

item.title: 以色列准备应对袭击事件，欧洲天然气走高
item.description: 由于中东紧张局势给市场带来了新一波波动，欧洲天然气价格走高。【原文：European natural gas prices edged higher as Middle East tensions brought a fresh wave of volatility to the market.】

item.title: 中国顶级量化投资人在市场反弹中结束投资策略
item.description: 中国一家顶级量化对冲基金正在关闭其市场中性产品，退出这一策略。最近，由于本地股大涨挤压了该基金的空头头寸，导致行业普遍亏损。【原文：A top Chinese quantitative hedge fund is shutting down its market-neutral products, exiting a strategy that saw widespread industry losses recently when a surge in local stocks squeezed their short positions.】

item.title: 炙手可热的印度私人信贷市场因繁荣加剧而面临风险
item.description: 印度的私人信贷市场增长迅猛，大量新参与者涌入直接借贷领域，加剧了人们对借贷标准弱化的担忧。【原文：India’s private credit market is growing so fast that a rush of new participants into the direct-lending sector is fueling concern about a weakening of lending standards.】

item.title: T. Rowe称10年期国债收益率可能在六个月内触及5%的水平
item.description: 据 T. Rowe Price 公司称，由于通胀预期上升以及对美国财政支出的担忧，基准国债收益率可能很快会触及一个关键水平。【原文：Benchmark Treasury yields may soon hit a key level on the back of rising inflation expectations and concerns over US fiscal spending, according to T. Rowe Price.】

item.title: JAB 将以 21.6 亿欧元收购 Mondelez 在 JDE Peet's 的股份
item.description: 投资控股公司 JAB 同意收购 Mondelez International Inc 持有的咖啡零售商 JDE Peet's NV 的股份，交易价值为 21.6 亿欧元（23 亿美元）。【原文：Investment holding company JAB agreed to acquire Mondelez International Inc’s stake in coffee retailer JDE Peet’s NV in a deal valued at €2.16 billion ($2.3 billion).】

item.title: Prosus 2025 年电子商务利润将增至 4 亿美元
item.description: Prosus NV 首席执行官 Fabricio Bloisi 表示，Prosus NV 计划在截至 3 月底的一年中，从其电子商务业务中获得 4 亿美元的调整后息税前利润，并预计未来这一数字将有所提高。【原文：Prosus NV plans to deliver $400 million in adjusted earnings before interest and tax from its e-commerce operations in the year to end-March, and sees this improving in future, Chief Executive Officer Fabricio Bloisi said.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑在连续三周下跌后保持稳定
卡森-布洛克说 "闭上眼睛购买 "美股，而非中国股市
item.description: 卡森-布洛克（Carson Block）以寻找估值过高的公司进行对赌而闻名，他说，随着稳定的资金流入推动市场不断走高，大多数投资者现在最好只购买最大的美国股票。【原文：Carson Block, famous for finding overvalued companies to bet against, said most investors would now do better to just buy the biggest US stocks as steady inflows push the market ever higher.】

item.title: 先正达寻求 30 亿美元的环境、社会和公司治理贷款，这是今年亚洲最大的一笔贷款
item.description: 农用化学品巨头先正达集团正在寻求一笔 30 亿美元的可持续发展相关贷款，这将是今年迄今为止亚洲最大的一笔与环境、社会和治理相关指标挂钩的美元贷款。【原文：Agrochemicals giant Syngenta Group is seeking a $3 billion sustainability-linked loan, in what would be Asia’s largest dollar facility linked to environmental, social and governance-related metrics so far this year.】

item.title: 据说大都会人寿正在洽谈收购大亨李嘉诚在中国以外的松桥资产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国保险公司大都会人寿保险公司（MetLife Inc.【原文：US insurer MetLife Inc. is in advanced talks to buy PineBridge Investments’ assets outside of China, people familiar with the matter said, in a deal that could be valued at $1 billion to $1.5 billion.】

item.title: 俄罗斯间谍是如何黑掉整个格鲁吉亚的？
item.description:
本周将举行大选，彭博社看到的文件揭露了莫斯科对前苏联的渗透程度。【原文：

With an election this week, documents seen by Bloomberg expose the extent of Moscow’s infiltration of the former Soviet state.

】

item.title: 阿美石油公司首席执行官称刺激政策推出后看好中国市场
item.description: 沙特阿美首席执行官阿明-纳赛尔（Amin H. Nasser）表示，在中国政府推出一系列旨在振兴亚洲最大经济体的刺激措施后，沙特阿美看好中国的石油消费。【原文：Saudi Aramco is bullish on China’s oil consumption after the government introduced a raft of stimulus measures aimed at reviving Asia’s biggest economy, Chief Executive Officer Amin H. Nasser said.】

item.title: 华尔街为失去的十年做好准备 — 但还不是时候
item.description:
市场策略师认为，S&P 500指数的估值越来越高，将挤压出更大的运行空间

。【原文：

Market strategists think the increasingly high valuation of the S&P 500 will squeeze out further room to run

】

item.title: 中东顶级杂货商 LuLu 在阿布扎比开设大型分店
item.description: 经营中东最大连锁大卖场之一的 LuLu Retail Holdings Plc 公司公布了在阿布扎比上市的计划，这可能是该地区今年最大的首次公开募股之一。【原文：LuLu Retail Holdings Plc, which operates one of the Middle East’s largest hypermarket chains, unveiled plans to list in Abu Dhabi in what could be among the region’s biggest initial public offerings of the year.】

item.title: 全球投资者连续两周从印度债券中撤资
item.description: 有资格在全球债务指数上交易的印度主权债券出现了第二周资金外流，这表明海外投资者对该国债务的态度正在降温。【原文：Indian sovereign bonds that are eligible to trade on global debt indexes saw their second weekly outflow, signaling overseas investors are cooling on the nation’s debt.】

item.title: 香港峰会吸引全球顶级银行家，香港寻求复兴
item.description: 香港有望在第三届年度峰会上接待全球顶级银行家，该峰会旨在提升香港作为全球金融中心的地位。【原文：Hong Kong is expected to host the world’s top bankers in the third edition of an annual summit intended to boost the city’s status as a global financial hub.】

item.title: 人工智能搜索初创公司 Perplexity 正洽谈 90 亿美元估值事宜
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，正在开发一款搜索产品、旨在与谷歌竞争的人工智能公司 Perplexity AI Inc.【原文：Perplexity AI Inc., an artificial intelligence company building a search product that aims to compete with Google, is in early talks to raise funding from investors at a valuation of about $9 billion, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 银行降息后中国股市震荡走高
item.description: 周一，中国股市走势摇摆不定，因为投资者权衡了商业银行降息与只有政府支出才能帮助经济好转的言论。【原文：Chinese stocks see-sawed on Monday, as investors weighed up commercial bank rate cuts against talk that only government spending will help the economy turn a corner.】

item.title: Waaree Energies 首次公开募股带动印度可再生能源股票反弹 357
item.description: 印度最大的太阳能电池板生产商将于本周一开始首次公开发售其价值 5.14 亿美元的太阳能电池板，以寻求抓住今年印度可再生能源股票涨势迅猛的机遇。【原文：India’s largest solar-panel producer will open its $514 million initial public offering for orders on Monday, looking to capitalize on the world-beating rally in the nation’s renewable energy stocks this year.】

item.title: 银行盈利可能无法激励印度投资者
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国人民银行贷款计划引发回购，长期价值存疑
item.description: 据交易员和分析师称，中国央行为股票回购贷款提供资金的计划为股价提供了直接支持，但也引发了对其长期有效性和借款人内在价值的质疑。【原文：The Chinese central bank’s program to fund loans for share buybacks has provided immediate support for stock prices but also raised questions about its long-term effectiveness and borrowers’ intrinsic value, according to traders and analysts.】

item.title: 中国钢铁需求量已降至全球总量的一半以下
item.description: 据世界钢铁协会称，由于中国房地产行业的衰退抑制了对金属的需求，2024 年中国的钢材消费量将在六年内首次低于全球钢材消费量的一半。【原文：China will account for less than half of global steel consumption in 2024 for the first time in six years, according to the World Steel Association, as the decline in the country’s real estate sector pummels demand for the metal.】

item.title: 据说马来西亚国家石油公司已向银行征求美元债券建议
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，马来西亚国家石油公司（Petroliam Nasional Bhd）已就潜在的美元债券发行向银行征求建议书，这将是马来西亚石油公司三年多来首次进行此类销售。【原文：Petroliam Nasional Bhd has sent requests seeking bankers’ proposals for a potential dollar bond offering, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be the Malaysian oil firm’s first such sale in over three years.】

item.title: 亚洲对冲基金在 9 月份的反弹中表现优于全球同行
item.description: 上个月中国股市的大涨帮助亚洲对冲基金在前三个季度的表现领先于全球同行，而此前三年的表现一直处于落后状态。【原文：A surge in Chinese stocks last month helped Asia hedge funds pull ahead of global peers for the first three quarters, after three years of trailing performance.】

item.title: 马来西亚 2025 年支出计划有望引起外国兴趣
item.description: 随着政府继续推进财政改革，马来西亚创纪录的支出计划必将进一步推动外国投资者对其资产的兴趣，尽管这对股市的直接影响不大。【原文：Malaysia’s record spending plan is set to drive further foreign interest in its assets as the government continues to build on its fiscal reforms, even if the immediate impact on equities is muted.】

item.title: 火锅与马力的混合。中国汽车的噱头是否太过分了？
item.description: 众所周知，中国的电动汽车制造商总是不断推陈出新，以各种新功能吸引买家。车载卡拉 OK、方向盘变身游戏机、座椅可倾斜成舒适的平躺床。【原文：China’s electric vehicle makers have been known to push the envelope when it comes to dreaming up new functions to attract buyers. There’s in-car karaoke, steering wheels that turn into gaming consoles and seats that recline into comfy lie-flat beds.】

item.title: 中国银行降低贷款利率以刺激疲软的经济
item.description: 作为一系列旨在恢复经济增长和阻止房地产市场崩溃的措施的一部分，中国央行在 9 月底降低利率后，又下调了基准贷款利率。【原文：China cut its benchmark lending rates after the central bank lowered interest rates at the end of September as part of a series of measures aimed at reviving economic growth and halting a housing market crash.】

item.title: 越南总理预计 2025 年经济增长率为 6.5% 至 7
item.description: 越南政府网站上的一篇文章称，越南总理范明正预计 2025 年越南经济将增长 6.5%至 7%，并表示政府将推动经济增长 7%至 7.5%。【原文：Vietnam Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh projects the nation’s economy will grow 6.5% to 7% in 2025 and says the government will push for expansion of 7%-7.5%, according to a post on the government’s website.】

item.title: 24 亿美元流入 ETF，比特币濒临 7 万美元
item.description: 比特币周一走高，原因是大量资金流入这种最大数字资产的交易所交易基金，以及对美国监管前景的乐观情绪提振了市场情绪。【原文：Bitcoin pushed higher on Monday as a spurt of inflows into exchange-traded funds for the largest digital asset as well as optimism about the outlook for US regulations lifted sentiment.】
